tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE equipment_maintenance (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    technician_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE equipment ( eqp_id INT PRIMARY KEY, eqp_name TEXT NOT NULL, eqp_type TEXT, purchase_date DATE, maintenance_schedule TEXT )

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs ( log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, eqp_id INT NOT NULL, maintenance_date DATE, technician TEXT, maintenance_description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (eqp_id) REFERENCES equipment(eqp_id) ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE maintenance_history ( history_id INT PRIMARY KEY, eqp_id INT NOT NULL, maintenance_date DATE, technician TEXT, maintenance_description TEXT, duration_hours INT, FOREIGN KEY (eqp_id) REFERENCES equipment(eqp_id) ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedules ( schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, eqp_id INT NOT NULL, frequency TEXT, last_performed DATE, next_due DATE, FOREIGN KEY (eqp_id) REFERENCES equipment(eqp_id) ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  equipment_type VARCHAR(50),
  last_maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_interval INT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  technician_name VARCHAR(100),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  scheduled_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  technician_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (technician_id) REFERENCES Technicians(technician_id)
);
